reviews.review_text: This product is defective. Only the left ear works properly. The right one was falls apart as soon as I took it out of the box. All I hear in it is statics when connected.

reviews.title: NO

reviews.title: DID NOT WORK

Beware buying from this seller since 2 identical items were sent unusable.

reviews.title: Restored air pods

left airpod doesn't work noise cancelling is absolutely horrible. you can tell the left airpod was heavily used which is fine that's what i bought. The right airpod was replaced. So it like awesome in the right ear and horrible in the left.Returning asap.

The sizes they provide for the ear plugs are both too big and too small which leads to both falling out of my ear. It has a few cool features but the overall audio quality doesn't compare to the AirPods 2nd gen.

reviews.title: Disgusting and dysfunctional.

The left one sounded like very loud static when AirPods were in transparency or noise cancellation mode. The case had gunk on it and the AirPods were very chipped up. I immediately returned them but am awaiting my refund. The Walmart customer service employee said the refurbished were really hit or miss.

reviews.title: don't recommend, still linked to old Apple ID !

I leave stuff places a lot so i need to be able to connect them in the Find My app.. should have bought them new, or at least from a different retailer..

reviews.title: Horrible don't buy
reviews.review_text: The item is refurbished but if it being sold here then it shouldn't feel refurbished the charger box was lose and the AirPods were still connected to the previous owner I cloud which means they had access to my location . I waited 7 days for delivery when contacting the seller I was told I could not exchange and had to send back and wait another 7 business days for refund. Totally unacceptable as I need to purchase another set of air pods .

reviews.title: Great Except for Still Tied to Another Account
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to keep these. Quality wise they were on point - clean, came in the box, included all accessories...even had the apple warranty still until Jan 2023...but they were still tied to someone else's account. So i got these messages showing "this person will be able to see your location" - and while I'm not leading a top secret lifestyle... I'd purchased 2 pairs from 2 different sellers, and the other pair didn't have the same error, so I ultimately decided to send these back. I'm giving 3 stars because its really not the sellers fault...there isn't a ton they can do about it if these are still tied to an old apple account...but at the same time, I don't think they're worth $130 in the case of them still being attached to an old account. You can judge for yourself, but just know that this is a possibility. As far as the refurbished quality though, they were top notch. Maybe 1-2 minor scratches on the case, but the headphones themselves were ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.title: Walmart and Seller act clueless if problem occurs
reviews.review_text: AirPods quit charging within the first year which would have normally been covered under manufacturer warranty, but this seller fraudulently entered a sale date of 7 months prior to my purchase! So Apple won't cover repair bc seller won't update DOS to the true date. Walmart and myself have tried contacting this seller multiple times and all they do is send back and copy and pasted response telling me how to print from my account. I don't need to print, I need Walmart to be honest and update the sale date to what it truly is. Unfortunately, no one can seem to figure this out. I have called customer service at least 15 times and spent about four hours on the phone. I have called my local Walmart stores in a desperate attempt for help, but they have no offerings, and the third-party seller has been contacted. Still no solution. So here I am with AirPods that won't charge, a manufactures warranty that won't be honored, and an extended warranty plan through Allstate, which won't be honored, because they say that I was supposed to be covered by Apple. Everyone in the situation is just putting your hands up in the air like “it wasn't me, it wasn't me” but I am not looking to blame anyone, I am desperately searching for a solution.
